zh.title: 华国锋任中共中央主席、中央军委主席
中国女排首次获得世界冠军
波兰团结工会被宣布为非法
美国首次宣布对日本实施贸易制裁
巴以领导人获得诺贝尔和平奖
中国首次载人航天飞行成功
费利克斯·鲍姆加特纳超音速跳伞
美国退出联合国教科文组织

en.title: Hua Guofeng succeeds Mao Zedong as Chairman of the CCP.
Hosni Mubarak becomes President of Egypt after Sadat's assassination.
US Congress overrides Reagan's veto on South Africa sanctions.
Leonard Bernstein, celebrated composer and conductor, dies.
Yasser Arafat, Yitzhak Rabin, and Shimon Peres win Nobel Peace Prize.
China launches Shenzhou 5, its first manned space mission.
Felix Baumgartner breaks the sound barrier in a freefall jump.
Bomb blast in Mogadishu, Somalia, kills over 500 people.
